meanings.definition: To open again after being closed.
meanings.sent2: They will be reopening the park gates in the morning.
meanings.sent3: After the power outage, the fridge was like a sleepy bear reopening its eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a flower reopening to the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The old bookshop was reopening its magical doors to the world.

meanings.sent1: The reopening of the school brought joy to the students.
meanings.sent2: The reopening of the museum attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The reopening of the cookie jar was a mystery to the kids.
meanings.sent4: The reopening of the treasure chest revealed unexpected riches.
meanings.sent5: The reopening of the circus tent was a colorful spectacle.
